com.erdao.android.mapviewutil.markerclusterer
Class MarkerBitmap

java.lang.Object
  com.erdao.android.mapviewutil.markerclusterer.MarkerBitmap

public class MarkerBitmap
extends Object

Utility Class to handle MarkerBitmap it handles grid offset to display on the map with offset

Author:
Huan Erdao

Constructor Detail

MarkerBitmap

public MarkerBitmap(Bitmap src_nrm,
                    Bitmap src_sel,
                    Point grid,
                    int textSize,
                    int maxSize)
NOTE: src_nrm & src_sel must be same bitmap size.

Parameters:
src_nrm - source Bitmap object for normal state
src_sel - source Bitmap object for select state
grid - grid point to be offset
textSize - text size for icon
maxSize - icon size threshold
